channel.title: Posts on XXXwordinfo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on XXXwordinfo

item.title: Dominance and (NYT) Submission
item.description: Hello fellow young person solvers. As a hip and very “with it” constructor myself I know the sort of contemporary content that cool modern people (like us) love to see in puzzles. In fact I regularly solve the New York Times digitally on my personal computer and therefore am very “plugged in” to all the new and exciting ways people just like you and I are using technology to communicate.

item.title: Spicy Lunch
item.description:
Did you know that the average Carolina Reaper, the hottest pepper in the world, is over 1.5 million Scovilles?!

In order to celebrate the publication of XXXWordInfo, I packed everyone something with some heat.

Introducing my first public mini, Spicy L(a)unch.
